name: LVRSNFRNDS
slogan: Everyone deserves to have fulfilling relationships - whatever they are
description: LVRSNFRNDS is a community that's here to help you discover and explore sexuality and relationships in a safe and friendly environment. We curate events, conversations and connections for our members.

team.title: Founder

team.bioHtml: Product, brand & community launch expert - Entrepreneur - Freelance Consultant - Experience in Music, Fashion, Luxury, Cosmetics, Tech.

team.name: Samy Zerrouki
team.bioHtml: +9 years Ops Ninja in: kitchenware, foodtech, ridesharing, and mobility @Citymapper! Launched a game for creative adults on Kickstarter. Based in London.

jobs.title: LVRSNFRNDS Member Scout ðŸ‡ªðŸ‡º
jobs.description:
LVRSNFRNDS is a **social club** for the curious at heart. We are on a mission to normalize relationships by design and sexual exploration. We provide our members with **safe spaces** where connections are spontaneous and meaningful, liberated from apps, norms and expectations.

With the rapid growth of online meets due to the global lockdown, LVRSNFRNDS has decided to dedicate significant resources to **expand its reach** and further build its member base. To support this initiative, we are recruiting member scouts in these 5 cities: **London, Paris, Berlin, LA & NY**. 

LVRSNFRNDS is committed to working with the best partners in our space. As a member scout, youâ€™ll get a broad introduction to **entrepreneurship**, business development, and marketing while helping to grow the community in your city.

**Responsibilities and Duties**
â€¢ Be a face of LVRSNFRNDS in your city 
â€¢ Generate leads and sign up LVRSNFRNDS members
â€¢ Work closely with HQ based in London on LVRSNFRNDS awareness
â€¢ Develop a nuanced understanding of our brand to be able to pitch LVRSNFRNDS to others

**Qualifications**
â€¢ Independent and enterprising self-starter
â€¢ Outgoing, curious, sex-positive and sociable
â€¢ Charismatic and friendly - you are the face of LVRSNFRNDS
â€¢ Meticulous and vigilant
â€¢ A savvy, tactful, and graceful communicator â€“ you intuitively find the right tone
â€¢ Previous work experience in a sales or customer service role a plus
â€¢ Having already a network/community is a BIG plus

If you're someone who loves to **connect people** and is passionate about building the future of relationships, we want to hear from you!

**What are the requirements?**
* Must be or be willing to become a LVRSNFRNDS member.
* Must be a LVRSNFRNDS fan and believe in our mission to inspire everyone to live ethical and fulfilling relationships - whatever they are.
* Must be 21+.
